#216

- Growing gregariously on horse dung in well-shaded mixed oak/hickory woodland.
- Cap delicate, semitranslucent with an upward-rolling margin at maturity.
- Stipe long, delicate, iridescent, with cotton-like elements closer to the base.
- Gills very shallow and blackish closer towards the center.
- Caps later deliquesced, leaving stipes intact.
